transcript:
Customer: Hello sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Haan ji sir aapka call aaya tha.
Customer: Haan miss call kar rahe the main mere paas phone aaya tha aapka.
Executive: Haan toh aapne baat sune bina hi cut kar diya fir aapka busy aaya tha.
Customer: Nahi madam maine sun liya mere ko jo sunna tha madam sun liya maine aapko band karna hai band kar do koi dikkat nahi main chalu karwa lunga madam. Theek hai aap
Customer: Suno maine payment ka payment ka manager aap ho na.
Executive: Madam aap hai na mujhe pata hai kya samajh rahe ho aap hai na mujhe dabane ki koshish kar rahe ho toh aap kisi galat fehmi mein ho ki main dab jaunga.
Customer: Sir yeh pehle toh aap apna mindset change kar lo meri baat suno main aapko pehle din se hi bolta hua aa raha hu.
Executive: Madam meri baat suno main aapko pehle din se hi bolta hua aa raha hu main aapko kuch nahi bola hai aap main pehle din se aapko bolta hua aa raha hu madam ki itna zyada pressure pehli baat toh aap mere ko pressure daal daal ke aapne hi karwa liya theek hai ab jab aadmi ke paas mein payment ka majburi hai toh aap usi ko samajh ke raazi ho ni aap mere ko baar baar pressurize kar rahe ho aap meri baat toh sun lo pehle pehle meri baat toh sun loge aap apni baat toh baad mein keh lena meri baat toh sunoge mere paas kuch bhi kar lo 28 tarikh tak ka time hai na uske baad bhi aap mere ko pressure daal rahe ho kya tarika hai.
Executive: Sir yaha pe maine koi pressurize kiya aapke words the na sir ki aap Wednesday aap karoge.
Customer: Toh madam main toh karne ko tayar hu aap toh mere ko alag hi tone mein bol rahe ho 10000 mangne ke liye thodi baithe ho aap toh yeh wording bol rahe ho.
Executive: Sir toh 10000 aap bol rahe ho ki 10000 le lo yeh konsi baat hai sir ki aap installment mein thodi na doge aap hamara madam maine aapko pehle din se suno suno suno mere paas mein aapki aap se meri pehle din hi baat hui thi jis din pehle installment maine gheri hai na usi din maine aap se puch liya tha madam ki mere main aap agar 10 10 15 15000 karke daal du toh aapne mujhe yeh baat boli thi ki haan sir ho jayega main aapko karwa dungi aapne yeh wording hai aapki recording main wohi cheez sun raha hu.
Customer: Bilkul hai mere paas saari recordings hai sir main maine aapko kya bola tha sir just like 30 dino ka time hai 30 dino ke andar andar aap 20 kiye fir 30 dino ke andar dusra 20 kar diye toh woh ho jayega but aap at the last moment keh rahe hai ki abhi aap itna madam mere ko ek baat batao aap baat nahi samajh rahe meri aap mere paas abhi bhi 18 din hai na mere paas 8 din hai na abhi bhi.
Executive: 18 din sir.
Customer: Sorry 8 din hai na mere paas 9 din abhi bhi.
Executive: Sir aapki us din hai na mere pe 9 din hai ya nahi hai pehle is baat ka jawab do.
Customer: Meri baat toh sun lo sir aap sunte nahi ho sir aapki problem yahi hai.
Customer: Suno.
Executive: Aapne mujhe bola ki mere paas abhi 8 din bilkul hai lekin jo aapne 35000 pay kiya tha sir uska aadha amount abhi pending iski wajah se amount 16 17000 pending hai.
Customer: Haan wahi wahi sir 16 17000 jitna bhi tha kyunki humne aapko teen parts ki deal ka approval liya khud apna proposal check kar lo sir toh hume usi amount ko track karna hota hai.
Customer: Agar main suno agar aadmi ke paas payment nahi hogi toh fir kya karoge madam aap yeh is baat ka jawab do pehle toh aap chalo.
Executive: Sir aapki services block ho sakti hai hume koi problem nahi hai sir meri baat suno meri baat suno meri baat toh sun lo meri baat toh sun lo block ho jayegi na block ho jayegi na baat khatam ho gayi aap block kar do theek hai.
Executive: Sir woh hum nahi karenge hamara kaam hai aapko inform karna madam main hai na agar aap ek minute dekho madam main meri baat nahi samajh rahe aap account manager ho na.
Customer: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Main payment dena jaanta hu toh madam main apna kaam karwana bhi jaanta hu theek hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir jante hai market ki situation aap bhi jante ho aur main bhi jaanta hu haan toh main bas baat hi khatam ho gayi aap itna pareshan kyun ho rahe ho hyper kyun ho rahe ho.
Customer: Main nahi main toh bilkul aapne sir bola ki theek hai madam aap mere ko baar baar pressurize kar rahe ho na toh aadmi koi bhi hoga woh pressurize hoga.
Executive: Sir aise maine aapko 17 din baad kal call kiya tha parso aap aise bol rahe ho ki main pressurize kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Madam abhi aap kaise aapko pressurize kar sakte ho abhi abhi aapne kya bola mere ko 10000 lene ke liye baithe hai kya aapne yeh wording boli hai mere ko.
Executive: Nahi maine abhi aapko yahi wording boli hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Koi baat hi nahi baat khatam ho gayi 10000 sir nahi le sakti seriously aap mujhe 10000 bol rahe ho ki main aapko.
Executive: Koi baat nahi madam maine keh toh diya aapko baat khatam ho gayi koi baat nahi.
Customer: Sir yeh baat aapko Monday bol deni chahiye thi sir ki main 10000 mein uskaan pay karunga Wednesday ko.
Executive: Aapko sir thoda baat hi khatam ho gayi na.
Customer: Baat khatam karo koi baat nahi aapko block karni hai block kar do dekh lenge.
Executive: Sir woh hum nahi karenge sir fir aap baad mein complaint karoge.
Customer: Madam baar baar main kya keh raha hu aap chhod do yaar chhod do.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe ek clear and cut bata dijiye ki.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states executive is pressuring him.

- Customer needs time till 28th to pay.

- Customer says he can pay in installments.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the due amount.

- Executive informed services could be blocked.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, installments, due amount, pressure
